properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 4:03AM EST until February 8 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations
of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts in the higher
terrain, especially from I-86 northward to North East.

* WHERE...Southern Erie county.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED
